snippet.title: Temple of the Lizard Men 4 Official Trailer - GOLD EDITION AVAILABLE!
snippet.description:
This is the trailer for  Temple of the Lizard Men 4. If you are a fan of my project series, I think you will like what TOTLM4 has to offer. Choose from six player classes, each with their own story line, and venture off to take on the final onslaught of the Shadow Realm. So sit back, relax, and enjoy the scenery :)

TOTLM4 is Released! Here is the link to the GOLD EDITION:
https://www.dropbox.com/scl/fi/mfpsdpy4noirx5all3vq4/lmtmpl4_Gold.zip?rlkey=7norl4e53ct94y9ezmnhruurn&dl=0

MUSIC PATCH UPDATE for those who want to do Let's Play videos (Not needed if you are going to play with the Gold Edition; the new music had already been incorporated into it):

https://www.dropbox.com/s/l8e8vfjtxjylen7/TOTLM4_Music_Patch.zip?dl=0


***Want to support me? Purchase my book series on amazon.com!***

***Book Series Link***
https://www.amazon.com/dp/B08P9N36Q9?binding=kindle_edition&searchxofy=true&ref_=dbs_s_bs_series_rwt_tkin&qid=1707652435&sr=1-3

***Adventures of the PPA: Invasion*** - EBOOK AVAILABLE!
https://www.amazon.com/dp/B08P3H15KQ

***Adventures of the PPA: Venomous Vengeance*** - EBOOK AVAILABLE!
https://www.amazon.com/dp/1795526491

***Adventures of the PPA: Project Resurrection*** - EBOOK AVAILABLE!
https://www.amazon.com/dp/B0875YZFD5

***Adventures of the PPA: The Genesis Cube*** - EBOOK AVAILABLE!
https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B09VQBCY45?ref_=dbs_m_mng_rwt_calw_tpbk_3&storeType=ebooks&qid=1648159067&sr=1-1

***Temple of the Lizard Men*** - EBOOK AVAILABLE!
https://a.co/d/idOpmka


Music Credit: 
The Monkey King by Krale 
[ Awesome song!  :)  ]

Namco - Pandora Theme from SF x Tekken
